parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Use comma to separate multiple user ids

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid API key or secret key

organisation_id.description: Currently this id is kept as static

country_code.description: ISO code of country from `country` table

lang.description: Language code e.g. en, fr, de etc.

objective.description: If mission is Goal then add its objective. e.g. Plant 100 trees

section.description: These section are for 'Mission' tab in front end, you can add unlimited amount of sections(Title+description)

document_id.description: If adding new document then leave it blank

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank

default.description: If its set as 1, then mission thumbnail will be set to this media

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank
